text: Chad Stahelski (born September 20, 1968) is an American director known for the John Wick movies. Before directing, Stahelski was a professional stuntman and performed stunts in The Crow for Brandon Lee. After Lee died on set, they imposed his face over Stahelski's body. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:American movie directors Category:Movie directors from Massachusetts Category:Stunt performers
title: Chad Stahelski
